thread.section_title: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pets Best Pet Health Insurance | petsbest.com
thread.title: Kristina
thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by Kristina

author: Kristina
title: Kristina
text: This insurance company is great. It was one of the top 5 when I was researching for my dog. What I love about their benefits is they cover for preventive medicine including vaccinations, etc. I've submitted 2 claims, and they were very quick in their response. I received email updates throughout the process. They're just so great, and it's one less headache I have to deal with, because they're just so efficient!
